org.osate.xtext.aadl2.errormodel.errorModel

Interface ComponentErrorBehavior

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AObject, EBSMUseContext, Element, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, TypeUseContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentErrorBehaviorImpl

    public interface ComponentErrorBehavior
extends Element, EBSMUseContext
    A representation of the model object 'Component Error Behavior'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Use Types
    • Use Behavior
    • Use Transformation
    • Events
    • Transitions
    • Outgoing Propagation Conditions
    • Error Detections
    • Error State To Mode Mappings
    • Properties

    See Also:
    ErrorModelPackage.getComponentErrorBehavior()
